articles.title: Cryptocurrency promoted by Argentina's Milei crashes
articles.author: Luis ROBAYO
articles.summary: Argentina's President Javier Milei admitted making a mistake on Saturday after promoting a cryptocurrency whose value soared and then crashed. His office announced an "urgent investigation". According to news outlets, Milei posted a message on social media platform X Friday evening praising a "private project" aimed at "stimulating the growth of the Argentine economy"

articles.title: ED seizes ‘biggest' crypto fund worth Rs 1,646cr
articles.summary: ED has seized its biggest-ever cryptocurrency worth Rs 1,646 crore as part of a money laundering investigation into a fraud investment scheme. Ahmedabad office of the federal probe agency has also seized Rs 13.50 lakh in cash, an SUV and a number of digital devices. CBI has conducted searches at 11 locations in Delhi and Haryana on alleged cyber criminals impersonating as Government officials.
